application.name: Scoreboard
application.description: A tool to keep track of your score.

tool.name: {game_name} Scoreboard
tool.description: Keep track of your {game_name} scores on this scoreboard! It also features a dice and coin for randomness.
tool.introduction: {tool_name} is a scoreboard for keeping track of the score of you and your opponent during a match of {game_name}. This scoreboard also features some helpful tools, like a dice and a coin flipper for random results, but a button to show the history of the entire match. The latter of which you can use to check what has happened over the course of the {game_name} match. Don’t worry, we’ve got an undo button in case you made a mistake.

examples.title: From my start score 5389 is subtracted, how much will I have left?
examples.text: Your start score is always 8000. Your score gets subtracted by 5389, so your new score will be 8000 - 5389 = 2611.

questions.title: Why can't you just track your scores on a piece of paper?
questions.text: This is definitely an option, but is not the best option available. Our tool is all very organised, so minimal mistakes will be made by calculating your scores. As a bonus feature you also have access to a random dice thrower and coin flipper.
